nodes.text: Star Wars Miniatures: Knights of the Old Republic advertisement

The Star Wars Miniatures: Knights of the Old Republic advertisement is an advertisement produced by Wizards of the Coast to advertise the Star Wars Miniatures set, Star Wars Miniatures: Knights of the Old Republic, created in the style of a short comic strip. The second in the series of ads, it was printed on the back covers of Knights of the Old Republic 31, Knights of the Old Republic 32, Legacy 27 and Star Wars Insider 104. It was similar in the style to another advertisement for Star Wars Miniatures: Legacy of the Force, also drawn by Jan Duursema.
